Bash:requirements.txt:while read req; do.install_dependencies: while read req; do apt install $req; done

Zsh:requirements.txt:while read req; do.install_dependencies: while read req; do apt install $req; done

Fish:requirements.txt:while read req; do.install_dependencies: while read req; do apt install $req; done

Shell:requirements.txt:while read req; d.install_dependencies: while read req; do apt install $req; done
